channel.title: AzureAD on KasdevTech
channel.description: Recent content in AzureAD on KasdevTech

item.title: AZ-104 Deep Dive Series — Azure AD Overview & Tenant Fundamentals
item.description: Explore Azure Active Directory, tenants, domains, directory structures, and licensing. Understand how Azure AD forms the backbone of identity and access management in Microsoft Azure.

item.title: AZ-104 Deep Dive Series — Managing Users, Groups & Guest Access
item.description: Learn how to efficiently manage users, groups, and guest access in Azure AD. Covers bulk import, B2B collaboration, dynamic groups, and real-world management scenarios.
